articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Shelling Drill
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Shelling Drill
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided a shelling drill of an artillery sub-unit under KPA Unit 681.
					 After receiving a report about the shelling plan, he indicated the firing order and method and gave an order to start the shelling.
					
					 Watching the drill, he severely criticized the sub-unit for failing to make good combat preparations.
					
					 He noted that its failure to make a successful shelling drill this time was attributable to the formalism manifested in training.
					
					 "The flames of the movement for becoming crackshots are furiously raging, true to the intention of the party not to allow formalistic and ready-made method and stylish practice in artillery training. But the minds of the commanding officers of this sub-unit and relevant unit seem to be away from a battle field", he said.
					
					  He added: "There are among some commanding officers practices of sending soldiers for other purposes and attaching less importance to the training. Of course, they might do sideline jobs for improving the living of service personnel and do their bit in building a rich and powerful nation as well. However, they should always give priority to making combat preparations."
					
					  He pointed out that the serious defects were manifested in the sub-unit's combat preparations because the party committee of the unit failed to successfully do the party political work, the work with the commanding officers and soldiers to help them perform their revolutionary duties.
					
					 He advanced important tasks to be fulfilled by the KPA to step up combat preparations and bolstering up the fighting capabilities, emphasizing that the KPA's combat preparations do not allow a unit to make them tomorrow if it failed to do today.
					
					 He was accompanied by Yun Tong Hyon, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Togolese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Togolese President
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Thursday sent a message of greeting to Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, president of Togo, on the occasion of its 54th independence.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would invariably grow strong, the message wished the president and people of Togo new successes in their work to consolidate the stability of the country and achieve its economic development.

articles.title: Gift from ORC Committee
articles.content:
Gift from ORC Committee
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Committee of the Organization of Railways Cooperation. 
					 Tadeusz Szozda, chairman and head of the delegation of the committee taking part in the 29th meeting of general directors of the organization, conveyed the gift to an official concerned.

articles.title: IWF Chairman Leaves
articles.content:
IWF Chairman Leaves
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Tamas Ajan, chairman of the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF), left here by air on Saturday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Military Postgraduate Institute Completed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Military Postgraduate Institute Completed
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Military Postgraduate Institute where the statue of leader Kim Jong Il is standing was completed at Kim Il Sung Military University on the occasion of the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The institute has all educational facilities and environment at the highest level as befitting the university which was established and has developed under the energetic guidance and loving care of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The successful completion of the institute as required by the Songun era made it possible to glorify for all ages Kim Jong Il's feats performed for army-building, develop the university into the one of the Generalissimos for training all-round military officers fully equipped with Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's strategy and tactics and increase the combat capabilities of the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army in every way.
					
					 A ceremony of its completion was held with splendor Friday.
					
					 Present there were Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, officials of armed forces organ, instructors and cadets and employees of the university, officials of military schools at all levels, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA), servicemen's families and officials of the units which made contributions to erecting the statue.
					
					 The statue of Kim Jong Il was unveiled by leading officials of army and the institute.
					
					 A floral basket was laid before the statue in the august name of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), state and revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 Also laid there were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and a floral basket in the name of the institute.
					
					 Placed there were floral baskets in the name of the KPA General Staff, the KPA General Political Bureau, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, KPA units at all levels, military schools, and units associated with  leadership exploits of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the statue.
					
					 Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, spoke at the ceremony.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il made sure that an institute, the highest course in military education of the DPRK, was built at the university and specified those to be trained, scope, educational method and contents, thereby building it into a prestigious and comprehensive center for training military cadres.
					
					 The appearance of the institute as the highest seat for training military commanding officers which goes by the august name of Kim Jong Il is a precious fruition of the energetic guidance given by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The speaker called on the institute to train more persons possessed of sense of obligation who share intention and sincerity with the supreme commander despite rain or snow, true fighters equipped with Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's strategy and tactics, heroic fighting spirit and perfect capability to fight an actual war and tiger-like fighters of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The participants looked round the statue, after being briefed on it.

articles.title: KPA Military Band March and Concert Mark Army Day
articles.content:
KPA Military Band March and Concert Mark Army Day
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A military band march and concert of the Korean People's Army (KPA) were held to mark its 82nd anniversary. 
					 The combined military band solemnly played immortal revolutionary hymns "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il", looking up to the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill. It started its march toward Kim Il Sung Square to the tune of "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "The General Is the Banner of Victory", flying the flag of the supreme commander and the flag of the DPRK in the van.
					
					 The loud band music praising the immortal exploits performed by the great Generalissimos in army-building resounded through the streets.
					
					 People waved their hands from the windows of skyscrapers towards the military band marching, playing "Song of the Revolutionary Army", "July 27 March", etc.
					
					 The military band entered Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 There was a concert accompanied by a ceremony.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador Presents Credentials to Sultan of Oman
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador Presents Credentials to Sultan of Oman
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Pak Chun Il, DPRK ambassador to Oman, presented his credentials to Qaboos Bin Said, sultan of Oman, on April 22.
					 The sultan expressed expectation that the relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields. -0-

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests attending the 29th meeting of general directors of the Organization of Railways Cooperation visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary life of the President and his family members in Mangyongdae, they looked round historic relics preserved with much care at his old home.
					
					 At the end of the visit Tadeusz Szozda, chairman of the Committee of the Organization of Railways Cooperation, said:
					
					 I was deeply impressed to visit Mangyongdae for the first time. I came to know well about the boundless reverence of the Korean people for their leaders.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Gold Medal in 2014 Asian Wrestling Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Gold Medal in 2014 Asian Wrestling Championship
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK player Jong In Sun won a gold medal at the women's 55 kg category in the 2014 Asian Wrestling Championship started in Kazakhstan on April 23. 
					 The championship brought together at least 200 men and women wrestlers from 16 countries and regions including the DPRK, China, Mongolia and Kazakhstan. 
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Kang Jin Hyok bagged a silver medal at men's 65kg category  and Han Kum Ok and Kim Ran Mi bronze medals at women's 58kg and 63kg categories.

articles.title: Potato-planting Begins in Vast Paektu Plain
articles.content:
Potato-planting Begins in Vast Paektu Plain
 Taehongdan, April 26 (KCNA) -- Potato-planting started in vast Paektu Plain. 
					 All officials and agricultural workers in Taehongdan County are registering successes in potato-planting every day.
					
					 After having completed all farming processes including compost production and carriage to fields and seed sprouting, farms are mobilizing manpower and machines to push ahead with the potato-planting as scheduled though the weather is unfavorable. 
					
					 The Hongam and Changphyong farms are keeping full-capacity operation of farming machines including tractors and potato planters. 
					
					 The Nongsadong, Sindok and Sodu farms are dynamically conducting potato-planting after working out concrete daily plans for potato-planting in every field. 
					
					 The Sambong, Sinhung and other farms of the county are overfulfilling their daily plans after carrying dozens of tons of quality compost to fields.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Koreas' Moves for Nuclear War against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Koreas' Moves for Nuclear War against DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet forces held the 5th KIDD meeting with the U.S. in Washington at which they talked about someone's "nuclear and missile threats" and discussed a proposal for carrying out the "tailored deterrence strategy" to cope with them. They blared that they would "jointly develop" the capacity for coping with missiles including Kill Chain and the missile defense system for detecting signs of nuclear and missile launches of the other party and mounting preemptive strikes on them.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this a clear revelation of the invariable intention and inveterate bad habit for confrontation of the south Korean puppet forces to do harm to fellow countrymen through military nexus with foreign forces, unwilling to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 As far as "nuclear and missile threats" are concerned, they come from the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula, threatening the DPRK by force of arms by mobilizing all means including nuclear weapons to realize their ambition for invading it.
					
					 Recently they staged the large-scale Foal Eagle joint military exercises under the simulated condition of invading the DPRK with huge nuclear strike means involved, pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme pitch of strain.
					
					 It is an exercise of the legitimate right for the DPRK to bolster up its defense capabilities for self-defence to cope with the warmongers' reckless war moves for aggression.
					
					 Such being a hard fact, the puppet forces are intensifying military cooperation with foreign forces while labeling the DPRK's just steps as "threats" for no reason. This is a brigandish racket to incriminate the exercise of the independent right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are slandering the DPRK, clamoring about "threats", but they can never conceal their despicable true colors as they are keen on the moves to impose nuclear disaster on fellow countrymen as servants for outsiders' war against the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Flails US "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
KCNA Flails US "Human Rights" Racket
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is calling for the gathering of "groups conducive to the improved human rights and democracy in north Korea" and assistance to it.
					 The U.S. Department of State announced on April 15 that it would grant 350,000 dollars to any organization engaged in such criminal activities as gathering information on the DPRK and smuggling undesirable literature and sending large balloons containing DVD and USB into it.
					
					 This shows that the U.S. is getting more pronounced in the anti-DPRK human rights smear campaign, frightened at the advantages and invincibility of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 It is the U.S. foul intention to overthrow those countries aspiring after independence against its unjust demand by way of accusing them of "human rights abuses" and instigating the filthy groups to undermine them from within.
					
					 The U.S. raised the issues of "human rights" and "democracy" as a pretext when it sought to collapse the socialist system in the Soviet Union and East European countries in the Cold War era and overthrow several governments in the Middle East and North Africa in recent years.
					
					 Anyhow, the U.S. doesn't know well about the socialist system in the DPRK and its people.
					
					 The DPRK's advantageous socio-political system was established by its people themselves in reflection of their will and demand. Under this system, the people are granted all kinds of political rights and freedom.
					
					 The working masses are masters of the state and society while everything serves them and such practice is guaranteed by law.
					
					 The DPRK people are now making greater strides in the struggle to defend the sovereignty and human rights with high honor and pride. 
					
					 The U.S. has too poor human rights records to talk about other countries' "human rights performance". As estimated by the world community, it, styling itself a "model country of freedom and goodwill", is the most "dangerous country" to the global peace as well as its populations.
					
					  Its cruel human rights violations have been well illustrated by such facts as its untold wars of aggression and massacres in different parts of the world, operation of germ experiment bases and development of lethal weapons, drone attacks on innocent peoples and tapping on the anti-war forces and even on its allies.
					
					 The German magazine Junge Welt disclosed that more than 3,000 citizens had been killed throughout the world by 390 rounds of the U.S. military drone attacks since the emergence of the Obama administration. But nobody was punished for the cases, and such practice is inconceivable in north Korea the U.S. is finding fault with, it pointed out.
					
					 The human rights situation in the U.S. is more serious.
					
					 The plutocrats, accounting for one percent of its population, have almost the bulk of the national wealth under their control while 99 percents are suffering from poverty. Its major cities, boasting of thriving, are crowed with jobless citizens, and the degenerate persons seeking abnormal desires increase in number with each passing day.
					
					 Foreign news reports warned the Americans to be more cautious about the domestic police than "terrorists" of other countries, saying that more than 5,000 citizens have been killed by the police in the U.S. after the September 11 incident.
					
					 The U.S., the world's worst human rights abuser, had better mind its own business, squarely looking into the advantages and invincibility of the Korean-style socialist system capitalism can never imitate nor possess.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Slammed for Trying to Close Progressive Press
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Slammed for Trying to Close Progressive Press
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Committee for Checking the Closure of Jaju Minbo and the People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" in south Korea held a press conference in Inchon on April 23 at which they denounced the puppet group for trying to close internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 At the press conference the organizations recalled that the Seoul City authorities submitted an administrative suit calling for closing Jaju Minbo to the Inchon District Court at the instigation of the "government", the "Saenuri Party" and conservative forces.
					
					 They termed the move to close a legitimate media institution a symbol of the dictatorial politics.
					
					 Jaju Minbo, founded in reflection of the desire for reunification, has fulfilled its mission amid support and encouragement of fellow countrymen, despite all suppression and pressure, they said, and went on: However, the anti-reunification forces are labeling Jaju Minbo as "one following the north", regarding it as a thorn in their flesh. Not content with this, they are trying to close it by invoking the "Security Law". 
					
					 This barbaric violence little different from that of the "yusin" dictatorship will be condemned by not only all Koreans but mankind.
					
					 The organizations called upon all people to turn out in the action to defend the progressive press.
					
					 The organizations demanded the Seoul City authorities immediately cancel the administrative suit.

articles.title: US President's Tour of S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
US President's Tour of S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea issued a statement on April 21 denouncing the U.S. president's tour of south Korea.
					 Obama's tour of south Korea is aimed to prod south Korea to recognize Japan's "right to collective self-defense" under the pretext of intensifying the south Korea-U.S.-Japan alliance and demand a conclusion of a military agreement between south Korea and Japan and the increase of the expenses for sharing the upkeep of the U.S. forces, the statement said.
					
					 It is a rude act for him to tour south Korea to put pressure on it at a time when people are in grief over the ferry sinking, it charged.
					
					 If the "government" accepts the U.S. demand despite the people's opposition, it will meet an all-people resistance, it warned.

articles.title: British Organizations Call for Deeply Studying Kim Jong Un's Work
articles.content:
British Organizations Call for Deeply Studying Kim Jong Un's Work
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on April 6 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party."
					 The statement said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his work clarified the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the eternal guiding idea of the Korean revolution.
					
					 He said that Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche and the great revolutionary idea representing the Juche era.
					
					 He called for conducting party building and activities guided by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and thus preserving the revolutionary nature of the party and advancing the revolution and construction in keeping with the idea and intentions of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He in his work called for holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 This reflects the unanimous will and faith of all Korean people to always advance along the road of victory indicated by Kim Jong Il, holding him in high esteem forever.
					
					 Kim Jong Un called upon all party organizations and officials to highly respect the people, put their interests above all and take care of them as their genuine mother would do.
					
					 The joint statement ardently appealed all followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea in the world to more deeply study the famous work of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Congo, Brazil
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Congo, Brazil
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting took place in Brazzaville, Congo, a meeting and Korean book exhibition in Goiania City, Goias State, Brazil and an opening ceremony of Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in San Paulo State, Brazil on April 14 and 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Louis Andregoma, chairman of the Congolese National Committee for the Study of the Juche idea, said that Korean-style socialism built and developed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and now being wisely led by Kim Jong Un is the one centered on the popular masses winning victories despite imperialists' moves to stifle it for its solidity and invincible vitality.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said that Kim Il Sung founded the original idea that the popular masses are masters of the revolution and construction and they are pushing ahead with the revolution and construction and, on its basis, built socialism of Juche in Korea.
					
					 The curator of Jose Marti Hall of Brazil praised Kim Il Sung as a genuine leader of the people who dedicated all his life to the people's freedom and liberation.

articles.title: Russian Papers Observe Day of Sun
articles.content:
Russian Papers Observe Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Russian papers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and photos dealing with his revolutionary activities, a photo of him standing together with leader Kim Jong Il and a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un between Mar. 29 and April 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 Komsomolskaya Pravda in an article titled "Whole life of believing in people as in Heaven" said that the life the President, founder of socialist Korea, is the one believing in people as in Heaven.
					
					 Pravda Primoriya said in an article titled "The DPRK, following socialism" that the DPRK is a socialist country which puts forward the popular masses as the masters of the state and society and serves them and a country where the President's idea of believing in people as in Heaven is applied. 
					
					 Moskovskii Komsomolets in an article titled "Father of people" praised him as the leader of the country and the great father of people.
					
					 Pri Armurskiye Wedomostsi, Nidjegorodskaya Pravda, Our Home-Sochi and Nakhodkinski Rabochi carried articles titled "Political idea of President Kim Il Sung" and "The eternal sun" praising his revolutionary career and exploits and explaining the validity and invincible vitality of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House in Russia on April 15.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It indicates the tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de fuego de artilleria de unidad 681 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige entrenamiento de fuego de artilleria de unidad 681 de EPC
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio el entrenamiento de fuego de la subunidad de artilleria adscrita a la unidad 681 del EPC.
					Al informarse del plan de fuego, el Mariscal definio el turno y el metodo de tiro y dio la orden de disparar.
					
					Despues de presenciarlo, dijo severamente que la subunidad no esta dispuesta bien al combate, cuya consecuencia se debe al formalismo en el entrenamiento.
					
					En acato al proposito del Partido de no permitir el formalismo y el esquematismo en el entrenamiento de la artilleria, se desarrolla con vigor el movimiento de artilleros certeros, pero parece que los comandantes de esta subunidad y la unidad correspondiente no piensen en los preparativos de combate, critico.
					
					Actualmente aparece el fenomeno de que algunos comandantes movilizan a los militares en el trabajo apartado del entrenamiento. Por supuesto, hay que hacer el trabajo secundario para la mejora de vida de los militares y desempenar el papel merecido en la construccion de la patria poderosa y prospera, pero, es preciso priorizar los preparativos del combate, subrayo.
					
					La causa del grave defecto en los preparativos de combate de esta subunidad se debe a  que el comite del Partido de la unidad no organizo bien la labor politica, o sea, la labor con los militares para que los oficiales y militares cumplan con exito sus misiones revolucionarias, senalo.
					
					Continuo que son impostergables los preparativos de combate del EPC y presento las tareas para este fin y el fortalecimiento de la capacidad combativa del EPC.
					
					Le acompano al Mariscal Yun Tong Hyon, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Togo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Togo
Pyongyang, 26 de abril (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, remitio el dia 24 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Togo, Faure Essozimna Gnassingbe, con motivo del 54o aniversario de la independencia del pais africano.
					En su misiva, el remitente manifesto la conviccion de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises seguiran fortaleciendose y desarrollandose.
					
					Deseo al destinatario y a su pueblo nuevos exitos en los trabajos para consolidar la estabilidad del pais y lograr el desarrollo economico.

articles.title: Inaugurado Instituto Militar de Postgraduado Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Inaugurado Instituto Militar de Postgraduado Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 82o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, fue inaugurado en la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung el Instituto Militar de Postgraduado Kim Jong Il que tiene una estatua de bronce de este Generalisimo.
					El instituto dispone de todas las instalaciones y condiciones docentes del maximo nivel conforme a la fisonomia de la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, fundada y desarrollada bajo la direccion energica y profunda atencion de los Generalisimos.
					
					Gracias a la construccion del instituto a las alturas de la epoca del Songun, se hizo posible glorificar para siempre las hazanas del Dirigente acumuladas en la construccion del ejercito, transformar la Academia en un plantel docente de los Generalisimos donde se forman los comandantes talentosos armados firmemente con la estrategia y tacticas de Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il y aumentar por todos los medios el poderio combativo del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.
					
					Tuvo lugar solemnemente el dia 25 la ceremonia de inauguracion.
					
					Estuvieron presentes aqui Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, los funcionarios de los organos de fuerzas armadas, profesores, empleados y estudiantes de la academia, los funcionarios de las escuelas militares a todos niveles, oficiales y soldados del EPC, familiares de militares y funcionarios de las unidades que contribuyeron a la construccion de la estatua de bronce del Dirigente.
					
					En la ocasion hubo la ceremonia de develado de la estatua de bronce del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					Develaron la estatua los cuadros del ejercito y del instituto.
					
					Fue depositado ante ella un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Quedaron colocados un cesto de flores a nombre comun del CC del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el otro a nombre del Instituto Militar de Postgraduado Kim Jong Il.
					
					Tambien fueron puestos los cestos de flores a nombre del Estado Mayor General y la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, las unidades y las escuelas militares de todos los niveles del EPC y las unidades donde estan registradas las hazanas de orientacion de los grandes hombres sin iguales.
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il ante su estatua de bronce.
					
					Jang Jong Nam, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, pronuncio el discurso de inauguracion.
					
					El orador dijo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo instaurar en la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung el instituto de postgraduado, como maximo sistema de educacion militar de Corea, enseno en detalles la norma de seleccion de matriculados, el numero de estos y el metodo y el contenido de educacion y transformo asi el instituto en una base universal de formacion de cuadros militares.
					
					Senalo que la transformacion del instituto militar en el centro supremo de formacion de comandantes, denominado con el nombre del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, es el resultado de la direccion incansable del Mariscal.
					
					Prosiguio que el instituto debe formar muchos combatientes fieles y competentes que compartan la misma voluntad y la fraternidad con su Comandante Supremo y asimilen la estrategia y tacticas de Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il, el espiritu de lucha heroica y la perfecta capacidad de combate.
					
					Los participantes recorrieron la estatua del Dirigente tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre ella.

articles.title: Tienen lugar marcha y concierto de la banda militar del EPC
articles.content:
Tienen lugar marcha y concierto de la banda militar del EPC
Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 82o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tuvieron lugar este viernes la marcha y el concierto de la banda militar del EPC.
					Tras interpretar con solemnidad los inmortales himnos revolucionarios "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il" hacia las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la capitalina colina Mansu, la banda militar general del EPC comenzo la marcha hacia la plaza Kim Il Sung, al compas de las canciones como "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!" y "El General es la bandera de la victoria", enarbolando al frente el estandarte del Comandante Supremo y la bandera nacional. 
					
					Repercutieron estruendosamente las musicas de elogio a las imborrables proezas de los Generalisimos realizadas en la construccion del ejercito. 
					
					Por las ventanas de los rascacielos estaban asomados los ciudadanos que saludaban con sus manos a la banda militar que marchaba interpretando las canciones como "Cancion del Ejercito Revolucionario" y "Marcha del 27 de julio".
					
					La banda militar llego a la Plaza Kim Il Sung donde se realizo el concierto militar acompanado de una ceremonia.
